title: Grapevine: Andrews awarded merit scholarship for medical school
content: Napa native Daniel Andrews has been awarded an academic merit scholarship valued at $5,000 towards his tuition at American University of the Caribbean School of Medicine (AUC), located on the island of Saint Maarten.      Andrews graduated from Pacific Union College in Angwin with a bachelor’s degree in Psychology in 2018.         Get tips on free stuff and fun ideas delivered weekly to your inbox         For the past six years Andrews has taught karate and character building to children at the Pinewood Karate School. In addition, Andrews has worked as a medical scribe and assistant at the Heart and Health Center in Napa since 2015, and he has also worked as a massage therapy teaching assistant at the Napa Valley School of Massage since early 2
